description: Try our easy to follow Green Pea & Semolina Fritters recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Savoury fritter,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Low salt,Quick & easy breakfast,Low sugar,Sesame free,Halal,Soy free,Vegetarian,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: Green Pea & Semolina Fritters Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 0.33 cup olive oil (plus extra to drizzle)
1 egg, poached (and roasted sweet berry truss tomatoes, to serve)

recipeInstructions.text: Process peas, onion, chilli and egg in a food processor until a rough paste forms. Transfer to a bowl and stir in semolina and almond meal. The mixture should be soft but not runny. Season to taste.

Heat half the oil in a large frying pan over a high heat. Place 2-3 heaped tablespoons of mixture in pan and cook for 1-2 minutes. Flip and cook for a further 1 minute or until crispy. Remove from pan and cover to keep warm. Repeat with remaining mixture and oil.
Serve fritters with egg and tomatoes, drizzled with a little extra oil and seasoned with pepper.
